bibl.title: Careful with That Computer. On Creating Maps by Multidimensional Scaling of Papyri in Katja Mueller's Recent Studies of the Topography of the Fayum.
bibl.note: À propos de: Katja MUELLER, Places and Spaces in the Themistou Meris (Fayum / Graeco-Roman Egypt). Using Multi-Dimensional Scaling (MDS) and Geographical Information Systems (GIS) for Locating Ancient Settlements in the Meris of Polemon / Graeco-Roman Fayum, ArchPF 50 (2004) pp. 199-214, 1 tabl., 7 figg.
HOFFMAN Piotr and Bartek KLIN, Careful with That Computer. On Creating Maps by Multidimensional Scaling of Papyri in Katja Mueller's Recent Studies of the Topography of the Fayum.
